eu_initiatives: BNVKI intends to participate in the European Commission's High Level Expert Group on Artificial Intelligence (https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/en/news/call-high-level-expert-group-artificial-intelligence)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: BNVKI is a member society of EurAI, the European Association for Artificial Intelligence (https://www.eurai.org/).
relevant_communication: BNVKI is responsible for the organisation of BNAIC, the annual Benelux Conference on Artificial Intelligence.
goals__remit: The aim of the BNVKI is to stimulate research on, and the application and education of Artificial Intelligence (AI), as well as the dissemination of knowledge about AI within the Benelux.
